Articles.Content:
Watch to the end to see the greatest tragedy of all....

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/aM00FwK4La0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(Video is by Danny2462 and linked cause he's awesome and blowing things up in new and amusing ways)
I will never understand the appeal of this guy. I also find his inability to speak a bit annoying too.

> 
> Watch to the end

I regret I did.

> 
> I regret I did.

Thank you for the review and sparing me. lol
I created a thread about disabling the new cursor. No replies. I hope squad can add a setting to change the cursor back to how it was pre 1.0.

> 
> I created a thread about disabling the new cursor. No replies. I hope squad can add a setting to change the cursor back to how it was pre 1.0.

Can you explain what the problem is?

> 
> Can you explain what the problem is?

The horror is just unspeakable... you have to see it to believe it...
